mapper.insert: insert into tb_report(rno, title, content, reporter, kind, no, mid) values(seq_report.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{reporter}, #{kind}, #{no}, #{mid})
mapper.update: update tb_report set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, state=#{state}, reason=#{reason}, mid=#{mid}, mdate=sysdate where rno=#{rno}
mapper.select: select * from tb_report where kind=#{kind} and no=#{no}
